thread.title: Islanders keep Long Island feel in Brooklyn debut

title: Islanders keep Long Island feel in Brooklyn debut
text:
> Top News Islanders keep Long Island feel in Brooklyn debut Signage for the New York Islanders is shows at the subway exit to The Barclays Center, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in New York. The Islanders are scheduled to make their new home debut at the Barclays Center on Friday. (AP Photo/Bebeto Matthews)
